usage: octopize-avatar-deploy [-h] [--output-dir OUTPUT_DIR]
                              [--template-from TEMPLATE_FROM]
                              [--config CONFIG] [--non-interactive]
                              [--save-config] [--verbose]
                              [--mode {production,dev}]

Avatar Deployment Configuration Tool

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --output-dir OUTPUT_DIR
                        Output directory for generated files (default: current
                        directory)
  --template-from TEMPLATE_FROM
                        Template source: 'github' to download from repo, or
                        path to local templates directory (default: github)
  --config CONFIG       YAML configuration file to load
  --non-interactive     Run in non-interactive mode (use defaults or config
                        file)
  --save-config         Save configuration to deployment-config.yaml
  --verbose             Verbose output
  --mode {production,dev}
                        Deployment mode: production (default) or dev
